short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick, engaging game that challenges users to identify countries based on their flags. Great as a quick time waster!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add to your browser and play right away!!

🌎 Guess the Country's Flag: Test Your Global Knowledge! 🏳️

Embark on a worldwide adventure with "Guess the Country's Flag" - the perfect Chrome extension for geography enthusiasts, trivia lovers, and anyone looking to expand their global awareness!

🧠 Challenge Your Mind:
• Test your flag recognition skills with flags from 195 countries
• Learn fascinating facts about each nation and its flag
• Improve your geography knowledge in quick, fun sessions

🏆 Track Your Progress:
• Beat your personal best streak
• Compare scores with friends and family

Perfect for:
📚 Students preparing for geography exams
🌍 Travelers planning their next adventure
🎓 Teachers looking for an engaging classroom activity
💼 Professionals working in international business
🧩 Trivia night enthusiasts sharpening their skills

Features:
• User-friendly interface with vibrant flag emojis
• Multiple-choice format for easy gameplay
• Educational facts about countries and flags after each correct guess
• Progress saving - continue your streak anytime!
• Works offline - play anywhere, anytime

Whether you're killing time, taking a quick break at work, or looking to learn something new every day, "Guess the Country's Flag" is your passport to global knowledge.
